verses.verse: Adam,<WH121> Seth,<WH8352> Enosh,<WH583>
Kenan,<WH7018> Mahalalel,<WH4111> Jared,<WH3382>
Enoch,<WH2585> Methuselah,<WH4968> Lamech,<WH3929>
Noah,<WH5146> Shem,<WH8035> Ham<WH2526> and Japheth.<WH3315>
The sons<WH1121> of Japheth<WH3315> [were] Gomer,<WH1586> Magog,<WH4031> Madai,<WH4074> Javan,<WH3120> Tubal,<WH8422> Meshech,<WH4902> and Tiras.<WH8494>
And the sons<WH1121> of Gomer<WH1586> [were] Ashkenaz,<WH813> Diphath,<WH9084> and Togarmah.<WH8425>
And the sons<WH1121> of Javan<WH3120> [were] Elishah,<WH473> Tarshish,<WH8659> Kittim,<WH3794> and Rodanim.<WH9546>
The sons<WH1121> of Ham<WH2526> [were] Cush,<WH3568> Mizraim,<WH4714> Put,<WH6316> and Canaan.<WH3667>

And the sons<WH1121> of Cush<WH3568> [were] Seba,<WH5434> Havilah,<WH2341> Sabta,<WH5454> Raama,<WH7484> and Sabteca;<WH5455> and the sons<WH1121> of Raamah<WH7484> [were] Sheba<WH7614> and Dedan.<WH1719>
And Cush<WH3568> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Nimrod;<WH5248> he began<WH2490> to be a mighty<WH1368> one<WH1368> in the earth.<WH776>
And Mizraim<WH4714> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of the people<WH3866> of Lud,<WH3866> Anam,<WH6047> Lehab,<WH3853> Naphtuh,<WH5320>
Pathrus,<WH6625> Casluh,<WH3695> from which<WH834> the Philistines<WH6430> came,<WH3318> and Caphtor.<WH3732>
And Canaan<WH3667> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Sidon,<WH6721> his first-born, Heth,<WH2845>
and the Jebusites,<WH2983> the Amorites,<WH567> the Girgashites,<WH1622>
the Hivites,<WH2340> the Arkites,<WH6208> the Sinites,<WH5513>
the Arvadites,<WH721> the Zemarites,<WH6786> and the Hamathites.<WH2577>
The sons<WH1121> of Shem<WH8035> [were] Elam,<WH5867> Asshur,<WH804> Arpachshad,<WH775> Lud,<WH3865> Aram,<WH758> Uz,<WH5780> Hul,<WH2343> Gether,<WH1666> and Meshech.<WH4902>
And Arpachshad<WH775> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Shelah<WH7974> and Shelah<WH7974> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Eber.<WH5677>

And two<WH8147> sons<WH1121> were born<WH3205> to Eber,<WH5677> the name<WH8034> of the one<WH259> was Peleg,<WH6389> for in his days<WH3117> the earth<WH776> was divided,<WH6385> and his brother's name<WH8034> was Joktan.<WH3355>
And Joktan<WH3355> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Almodad,<WH486> Sheleph,<WH8026> Hazarmaveth,<WH2700> Jerah,<WH3392>
Hadoram,<WH1913> Uzal,<WH187> Diklah,<WH1853>
Ebal,<WH9402> Abimael,<WH39> Sheba,<WH7614>
Ophir,<WH211> Havilah,<WH2341> and Jobab;<WH3103> all<WH3605> these<WH428> [were] the sons<WH1121> of Joktan.<WH3355>
Shem,<WH8035> Arpachshad,<WH775> Shelah,<WH7974>
Eber,<WH5677> Peleg,<WH6389> Reu,<WH7466>
Serug,<WH8286> Nahor,<WH5152> Terah,<WH8646>
Abram,<WH87> that is Abraham.<WH85>
The sons<WH1121> of Abraham<WH85> [were] Isaac<WH3327> and Ishmael.<WH3458>
These<WH428> are their genealogies:<WH8435> the first-born of Ishmael<WH3458> [was] Nebaioth,<WH5032> then Kedar,<WH6938> Adbeel,<WH110> Mibsam,<WH4017>
Mishma,<WH4927> Dumah,<WH1746> Massa,<WH4854> Hadad,<WH2301> Tema,<WH8485>
Jetur,<WH3195> Naphish<WH5305> and Kedemah;<WH6929> these<WH428> [were] the sons<WH1121> of Ishmael.<WH3458>

And the sons<WH1121> of Keturah,<WH6989> Abraham's concubine,<WH6370> [whom] she bore,<WH3205> [were] Zimran,<WH2175> Jokshan,<WH3370> Medan,<WH4091> Midian,<WH4080> Ishbak,<WH3435> and Shuah.<WH7774> And the sons<WH1121> of Jokshan<WH3370> [were] Sheba<WH7614> and Dedan.<WH1719>
And the sons<WH1121> of Midian<WH4080> [were] Ephah,<WH5891> Epher,<WH6081> Hanoch,<WH2585> Abida,<WH28> and Eldaah.<WH420> All<WH3605> these<WH428> were the sons<WH1121> of Keturah.<WH6989>
And Abraham<WH85> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Isaac.<WH3327> The sons<WH1121> of Isaac<WH3327> [were] Esau<WH6215> and Israel.<WH3478>
The sons<WH1121> of Esau<WH6215> [were] Eliphaz,<WH464> Reuel,<WH7467> Jeush,<WH3266> Jalam,<WH3281> and Korah.<WH7141>
The sons<WH1121> of Eliphaz<WH464> [were] Teman,<WH8487> Omar,<WH201> Zephi,<WH6825> Gatam,<WH1609> Kenaz,<WH7073> Timna,<WH8555> and Amalek.<WH6002>
The sons<WH1121> of Reuel<WH7467> [were] Nahath,<WH5184> Zerah,<WH2226> Shammah,<WH8048> and Mizzah.<WH4199>
And the sons<WH1121> of Seir<WH8165> [were] Lotan,<WH3877> Shobal,<WH7732> Zibeon,<WH6649> Anah,<WH6034> Dishon,<WH1787> Ezer,<WH687> and Dishan.<WH1789>
And the sons<WH1121> of Lotan<WH3877> [were] Hori<WH2752> and Homam;<WH1950> and Lotan's sister<WH269> [was] Timna.<WH8555>
The sons<WH1121> of Shobal<WH7732> [were] Alian,<WH5935> Manahath,<WH4506> Ebal,<WH5858> Shephi,<WH8195> and Onam.<WH208> And the sons<WH1121> of Zibeon<WH6649> [were] Aiah<WH345> and Anah.<WH6034>
The son<WH1121> of Anah<WH6034> [was] Dishon.<WH1787> And the sons<WH1121> of Dishon<WH1787> [were] Hamran,<WH2566> Eshban,<WH790> Ithran,<WH3506> and Cheran.<WH3763>
The sons<WH1121> of Ezer<WH687> [were] Bilhan,<WH1092> Zaavan<WH2190> and Jaakan.<WH3292> The sons<WH1121> of Dishan<WH1789> [were] Uz<WH5780> and Aran.<WH765>

Now these<WH428> are the kings<WH4428> who<WH834> reigned<WH4427> in the land<WH776> of Edom<WH9000> before<WH6440> any king<WH4428> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> reigned.<WH4427> Bela<WH1106> [was] the son<WH1121> of Beor,<WH1160> and the name<WH8034> of his city<WH5892> was Dinhabah.<WH1838>
When Bela<WH1106> died,<WH4191> Jobab<WH3103> the son<WH1121> of Zerah<WH2226> of Bozrah<WH1224> became<WH4427> king<WH4427> in his place.<WH8478>
When Jobab<WH3103> died,<WH4191> Husham<WH2367> of the land<WH776> of the Temanites<WH8489> became<WH4427> king<WH4427> in his place.<WH8478>

When Husham<WH2367> died,<WH4191> Hadad<WH1908> the son<WH1121> of Bedad,<WH911> who defeated<WH5221> Midian<WH4080> in the field<WH7704> of Moab,<WH4124> became<WH4427> king<WH4427> in his place;<WH8478> and the name<WH8034> of his city<WH5892> [was] Avith.<WH5762>
When Hadad<WH1908> died,<WH4191> Samlah<WH8072> of Masrekah<WH4957> became<WH4427> king<WH4427> in his place.<WH8478>
When Samlah<WH8072> died,<WH4191> Shaul<WH7586> of Rehoboth<WH7344> by the River<WH5104> became<WH4427> king<WH4427> in his place.<WH8478>
When Shaul<WH7586> died,<WH4191> Baal-hanan the son<WH1121> of Achbor<WH5907> became<WH4427> king<WH4427> in his place.<WH8478>

When Baal-hanan died,<WH4191> Hadad<WH1908> became<WH4427> king<WH4427> in his place;<WH8478> and the name<WH8034> of his city<WH5892> was Pai,<WH6464> and his wife's name<WH8034> was Mehetabel,<WH4105> the daughter<WH1323> of Matred,<WH4308> the daughter<WH1323> of Mezahab.<WH4314>
Then Hadad<WH1908> died.<WH4191> Now the chiefs<WH441> of Edom<WH9000> were: chief<WH441> Timna,<WH8555> chief<WH441> Aliah,<WH5933> chief<WH441> Jetheth,<WH3509>
chief<WH441> Oholibamah,<WH173> chief<WH441> Elah,<WH425> chief<WH441> Pinon,<WH6373>
chief<WH441> Kenaz,<WH7073> chief<WH441> Teman,<WH8487> chief<WH441> Mibzar,<WH4014>
chief<WH441> Magdiel,<WH4025> chief<WH441> Iram.<WH5902> These<WH428> [were] the chiefs<WH441> of Edom.<WH9000>
